name: Dodgeman 2!
description:
The sinister Throwman is out for revenge! Help Dodgeman thwart his nasty plans by dodging everything that Throwman is throwing at him.

Be careful, though! The nefarious Throwman has spent the last 10 years perfecting his art and leaves no margin for error! If so much as a pixel of an object brushes against you, you will lose a life!

Collect flashing objects to build ladders, jetpacks, spacesuits and more to work your way upwards towards the source of the problem - Throwman himself! Can you defeat Throwman and save yourself and the planet from falling destruction?

Originally released as a Flash game for Newgrounds.com in 2008, Dodgeman 2 is now available for the first time for PC!
